fields.name: utility_id_ferc
fields.description: FERC-assigned identification number for each respondent utility.

fields.name: fuel_qty_burned
fields.description: Quantity of fuel burned in report year, in reported units.

fields.name: fuel_mmbtu_per_unit
fields.description: Average mmbtu of fuel burned in report year per reported unit.

fields.name: fuel_cost_per_unit_burned
fields.description: Average cost of fuel per reported unit burned in report year.

fields.name: fuel_cost_per_unit_delivered
fields.description: Average cost of fuel per unit delivered in report year.

fields.name: fuel_cost_per_mmbtu
fields.description: Average cost of fuel per mmbtu burned in report year.

fields.name: fuel_cost_per_mwh
fields.description: Average cost of fuel burned per MWh of net generation in report year.

fields.name: fuel_mmbtu_per_mwh
fields.description: Average mmbtu per MWh of net generation.
